ValidationRule.description: GBE and Key Code must be blank for D&S DR Approvers, please clear these fields.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), ISPICKVAL( SBU__c , "D&S"), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(text( GBE__c ))), NOT(ISBLANK(Key_Code__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: GBE and Key Code must be blank for D&S DR Approvers, please clear these fields.
